actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and Chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide mandatory social security coverage for Members of Congress and for the President and Vice President, offsetting against any benefits based on the coverage so provided the amount of any civil service annuities simultaneously payable on the basis of such coverage.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to include Members of Congress, the President, and the Vice President under the Federal Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance system.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and Chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide mandatory social security coverage for Members of Congress and for the President and Vice President, offsetting against any benefits based on the coverage so provided the amount of any civil service annuities simultaneously payable on the basis of such coverage.
